extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the product ID present on the machine for Microsoft Office 2008.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f "/Applications/Microsoft Office 2008/Office/OfficePID.plist" ]; then result=`/usr/bin/defaults read /Applications/Microsoft\ Office\ 2008/Office/OfficePID 1825` fi echo "<result>$result</result>"
